articles.title: California man arrested, charged in American Airlines attack on flight attendant - Fox News
articles.description: A California man was arrested Monday and charged with assaulting an American Airlines flight attendant during a trip that had to be diverted.
articles.content:
A California man was arrested Monday and charged with assaulting an American Airlines flight attendant during a flight that had to be diverted.

articles.title: American Airlines cancels nearly 850 flights on Sunday - News24
articles.description: American Airlines canceled nearly 850 domestic and international flights on Sunday, citing staffing shortages and unfavorable weather, pushing total cancellations to 1 739 and counting since Friday.
